sentence.Network_en: And he said unto him, "Who is my neighbor?"
sentence.Network_cn: 他于是对他说道：“谁是我邻居？”

sentence.Network_en: A neighbor sheltered the boy for seven days.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个邻居收留了这个男孩在他家藏了7天。

sentence.Network_en: "Who is it?" he called.— 'It's your neighbor.'

这种相似用户通常被称为最近邻居（Nearest Neighbor）。用户之间的相似度是通过比较两个用户的行为选择矢量得到的。

encyclopedia.content: 名词 n. [C] 1.邻居；邻近的人锛埢蛭镲級 2.邻国 Canada and the United States are neighbors. 加拿大和美国是邻邦。 3.同胞，伙伴 形容词 a. 1.邻近的；邻接的 不及物动词 vi. 1.住在附近 2.锛堄搿..)邻接[on/upon] Our school neighbors on a square. 我们学校与一个广场毗邻。 及物动词 vt. 1.与。..为邻 以下结果来自互联网网络释义 neighbor 1.邻居（噪音来源） [听力]九大特色场景词汇 - 艾迪国际留学。.. neighbor 邻居

means.word_mean: 1. a person who lives (or is located) near another
2. a nearby object of the same kind;

sentences.sentence: "Fort Worth is a neighbor of Dallas"
"what is the closest neighbor to the Earth?"

means.word_mean: 1. live or be located as a neighbor;
2. be located near or adjacent to;

stems_affixes.word_buile: neighbor邻居+ing表形容词→adj.邻近的, 接壤的
neighboring[adj.邻近的, 接壤的]→adj.邻近的
neigh连接,邻近+bor→n.邻居, 邻国
neighbor邻居+hood性质→n.附近, 邻近

Sentence.sentence: She does not believe what her neighbors said.
His research in the neighboring town has taken longer than he expected.
It may seem obvious, but it's no longer enough simply to do business with our friends and neighbors here at home.
